name: Dragon Iris
description: A Rich story about Humans and Dragons living in a place called Trae. A new tale about the origin of the Dragons, their society and relationship with Humans. Play with both Humans and Dragons in a tactical battle system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 600 MB available space
